imdb.plot outline: The Sundance is one of the most sacred ceremonies for the people of the First Nations. Dancers embark on a spiritual journey for healing in a grueling ceremony that has long been forbidden to photograph or film. But for the first time ever these filmmakers were given access to the Ceremony for this feature documentary.
imdb.title: Sundance
plot: The _Sundance_ (qv) is one of the most sacred ceremonies for the people of the First Nations. Dancers embark on a spiritual journey for healing in a grueling ceremony that has long been forbidden to photograph or film. But for the first time ever these filmmakers were given access to the Ceremony for this feature documentary.::BIrla, Abhish S.
